articles.title: Electrically driven organic laser using integrated OLED pumping - Nature.com
articles.description: An electrically driven organic semiconductor laser is achieved by integrating a device structure that efficiently couples an organic light-emitting diode, with extremely high internal-light generation, with a polymer distributed feedback laser.

articles.title: Uniquely preserved gut contents illuminate trilobite palaeophysiology - Nature.com
articles.description: Fossilized gut contents of an Ordovician trilobite shed light on the feeding habits of one of the most common and well-known extinct arthropods.
